weekly_top_story.headline: US President Donald Trump announces up to 100% tariffs on branded and patented pharmaceutical drugs
weekly_top_story.summary: President Trump declared tariffs of up to 100% on imports of branded and patented pharmaceutical drugs starting October 1, 2025, potentially disrupting global pharmaceutical trade and significantly impacting India’s drug sector.

stories.headline: Trump Slaps New Tariffs On Pharmaceutical Drugs
stories.summary: In the last 24 hours, President Trump announced an aggressive tariff policy targeting pharmaceutical imports, which may reshape global supply chains and raise drug prices internationally.
